Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Wild Goat Style, pottery heavy bowl; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (fired reddish); exterior: surface very worn (almost all of white slip lost).
Curator's comments: The lack of interior decoration suggests that the sherd may be early in the Chian pottery sequence.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2034) (phase 2)
